title: Return of the Ghosts
outcome: Formerly 'disappeared' individuals begin to reappear in Stenograd, untracked by the BCI. Their presence exposes flaws in the system, sparking widespread fear and speculation. These 'ghosts' disrupt daily routines, create social unrest, and force Council to urgently confront the limits of their control.

events.description: Dozens of residents previously erased from BCI watchlists reappear, unregistered by digital systems but physically present in the city.
Untracked individuals gather at public sites, confusing authorities and residents. Citizens increasingly question the BCI’s power and accuracy.
Council requests urgent technical reviews. Lintz pushes for transparency, while Directorate insists on detaining the 'ghosts' to restore confidence.
Rising demonstrations call for clarification on the 'ghosts.' Several BCI officials are targeted with accusations of abuse and manipulation.
System audit reveals a dormant algorithm restoring erased profiles with corrupted details. Fears grow that anyone could be erased or reappeared at any time.
